column4: Does anybody have any advice on how to share a server amongst a couple people so as to work on a group project making a website? I'd like to do it without giving them TOO much access to the config files, but I can't think of how to do it without giving them root.
sudo can give specic users specific access to specific commands.. depending on your needs
is there a good way to do this by adding them a certain group or something?
no  idea. ive rarely had to do that wort of work
